article:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS article (
        ID int NOT NULL,
        title varchar(100),
        summary varchar(500),
        image_url varchar(100),
        href varchar(100),
        PRIMARY KEY(ID)
    );
horoscopes:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS horoscopes (
        ID int NOT NULL,
        type varchar(20),
        description varchar(200),
        image_url varchar(100),
        href varchar(100),
        PRIMARY KEY(ID)
    );
